thud...>"},{"lineNumber":93554,"originalJapaneseLine":"心臓が痛いまでの鼓動を打ち、","translatedEnglishLine":"Her heart was beating red."},{"lineNumber":93556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":93557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これって……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This it.\""},{"lineNumber":93560,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":93561,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":93562,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えええええっ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehhhh!?!"},{"lineNumber":93563,"originalJapaneseLine":"　フラワー番地強盗団を解散するー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're disbanding the Flower District Robber Gang!?\""},{"lineNumber":93564,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おうっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":93565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そんなぁー、なんでですか！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no way, why!?\""},{"lineNumber":93566,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はっ、ついに俺達に愛想がつきて！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ha! You finally got fed up with us!\""},{"lineNumber":93567,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ、馬ー鹿、そんなんじゃねーよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, idiot, it's not like that.\""},{"lineNumber":93568,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに正確にゃ解散じゃねー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And more accurately, it's not a disbandment."},{"lineNumber":93569,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺が頭を抜けるってだけだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm just stepping down as the leader."},{"lineNumber":93570,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誰かが頭を引き継ぐってんなら任せるぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"If someone else wants to take over, I'm fine with that.\""},{"lineNumber":93571,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでまた突然そんな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why such a sudden decision...\""},{"lineNumber":93572,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっとここの調子がな……おかしいんだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, something's off inside here... It's strange...\""},

{"lineNumber":93573,"originalJapaneseLine":"トントンとエレナは自分の胸を叩いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Elena tapped gently on her own chest."},

{"lineNumber":93574,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスの馬鹿と普通に会話する分にはいいんだが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's fine when I just talk normally with that idiot Rance,"},

{"lineNumber":93575,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あいつが不意に近づいてきたりするとな……","translatedEnglishLine":"but when he suddenly comes close... "},

{"lineNumber":93576,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最近、なんだ、その……","translatedEnglishLine":"Lately, I mean, um..."},

{"lineNumber":93577,"originalJapaneseLine":"「心臓がどきどきと高鳴って仕方ねぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"My heart can't stop pounding...\" "},

{"lineNumber":93578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、それって……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, that means...?"},

{"lineNumber":93579,"originalJapaneseLine":"「顔は赤くなるし、上手く喋れなくもなる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My face gets red, and I can't speak properly either.\" "},

{"lineNumber":93580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、ちょっとそれって、それって――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait, that means, it means—\" "},

{"lineNumber":93581,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah...\" "},

{"lineNumber":93582,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺、なんかの病気みてぇだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I feel like I have some kind of illness!\" "},

{"lineNumber":93583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\" "},

{"lineNumber":93584,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へへっ、最近じゃ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh, lately,"},

{"lineNumber":93585,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あいつの顔見てると泣きたくまでなる始末」","translatedEnglishLine":"just seeing his face makes me want to cry.\" "},

{"lineNumber":93586,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、散々無茶してきたからな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I've pushed myself to the limit..."},

{"lineNumber":93587,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのツケが溜まってたんだろうぜ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I guess the consequences have piled up...\" "},

{"lineNumber":93588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってわけで悪ぃ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So yeah, sorry!"},

{"lineNumber":93589,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前らと馬鹿やるのもここらが潮時だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is about the time I stop fooling around with you guys!\" "},

{"lineNumber":93590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\" "}] }

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい加減にしろ！　このボケが！」
「おーっと、危ない！
がははは、じゃーなー！」
「あっ、逃げんな！　この発情ザル！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, don't run away! You horny monkey!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くそっ、今の内に笑っとけ。
いつか絶対に吠え面かかせてやるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someday I'll definitely make you eat those words."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜とくん、とくん、とくん……＞
「あっ……くそ……」
エレナが体に違和感を覚え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena felt a strange sensation in her body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の胸に触れる。
＜どっどっどっどっどっどっ……＞
心臓が痛いまでの鼓動を打ち、
カーッとエレナの顔が赤くなっていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Elena's face flushed hot red.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これって……
やっぱ、そういうことだよな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's really that kind of thing, isn't it...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えええええっ！？
フラワー番地強盗団を解散するー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're disbanding the Flower District Robber Gang!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おうっ」
「そ、そんなぁー、なんでですか！？
はっ、ついに俺達に愛想がつきて！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha! You finally got fed up with us!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、馬ー鹿、そんなんじゃねーよ」
「それに正確にゃ解散じゃねー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And more accurately, it's not a disbandment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が頭を抜けるってだけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm just stepping down as the leader.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが頭を引き継ぐってんなら任せるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If someone else wants to take over, I'm fine with that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでまた突然そんな……」
「ちょっとここの調子がな……おかしいんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, something's off inside here... It's strange..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トントンとエレナは自分の胸を叩いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena tapped gently on her own chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスの馬鹿と普通に会話する分にはいいんだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's fine when I just talk normally with that idiot Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつが不意に近づいてきたりするとな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but when he suddenly comes close...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最近、なんだ、その……
「心臓がどきどきと高鳴って仕方ねぇ……」
「えっ、それって……
「顔は赤くなるし、上手く喋れなくもなる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My face gets red, and I can't speak properly either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょ、ちょっとそれって、それって――」
「ああ……
「俺、なんかの病気みてぇだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I feel like I have some kind of illness!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへっ、最近じゃ
あいつの顔見てると泣きたくまでなる始末」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just seeing his face makes me want to cry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、散々無茶してきたからな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I've pushed myself to the limit...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのツケが溜まってたんだろうぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I guess the consequences have piled up..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってわけで悪ぃ！
お前らと馬鹿やるのもここらが潮時だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is about the time I stop fooling around with you guys!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい加減にしろ！　このボケが！」
「おーっと、危ない！
がははは、じゃーなー！」
「あっ、逃げんな！　この発情ザル！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, don't run away! You horny monkey!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くそっ、今の内に笑っとけ。
いつか絶対に吠え面かかせてやるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someday I'll definitely make you eat those words."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜とくん、とくん、とくん……＞
「あっ……くそ……」
エレナが体に違和感を覚え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena felt a strange sensation in her body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の胸に触れる。
＜どっどっどっどっどっどっ……＞
心臓が痛いまでの鼓動を打ち、
カーッとエレナの顔が赤くなっていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Elena's face flushed hot red.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これって……
やっぱ、そういうことだよな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's really that kind of thing, isn't it...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えええええっ！？
フラワー番地強盗団を解散するー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're disbanding the Flower District Robber Gang!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おうっ」
「そ、そんなぁー、なんでですか！？
はっ、ついに俺達に愛想がつきて！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha! You finally got fed up with us!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、馬ー鹿、そんなんじゃねーよ」
「それに正確にゃ解散じゃねー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And more accurately, it's not a disbandment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が頭を抜けるってだけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm just stepping down as the leader.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが頭を引き継ぐってんなら任せるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If someone else wants to take over, I'm fine with that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでまた突然そんな……」
「ちょっとここの調子がな……おかしいんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, something's off inside here... It's strange..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トントンとエレナは自分の胸を叩いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena tapped gently on her own chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスの馬鹿と普通に会話する分にはいいんだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's fine when I just talk normally with that idiot Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつが不意に近づいてきたりするとな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but when he suddenly comes close...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最近、なんだ、その……
「心臓がどきどきと高鳴って仕方ねぇ……」
「えっ、それって……
「顔は赤くなるし、上手く喋れなくもなる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My face gets red, and I can't speak properly either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょ、ちょっとそれって、それって――」
「ああ……
「俺、なんかの病気みてぇだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I feel like I have some kind of illness!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへっ、最近じゃ
あいつの顔見てると泣きたくまでなる始末」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just seeing his face makes me want to cry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、散々無茶してきたからな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I've pushed myself to the limit...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのツケが溜まってたんだろうぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I guess the consequences have piled up..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってわけで悪ぃ！
お前らと馬鹿やるのもここらが潮時だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is about the time I stop fooling around with you guys!"
